subject: Football
lead_paragraph: While Florida Coach Urban Meyer's on-field intensity can evoke hard-line coached of the past, part of his success as a modern coach can be seen every time he pulls his BlackBerry from his pocket.
snippet: While Florida Coach Urban Meyer's on-field intensity can evoke hard-line coached of the past, part of his success as a modern coach can be seen every time he pulls his BlackBerry from his pocket.
